abstract: Video reports poured out of Turkey on Sunday after a powerful earthquake struck the country's eastern region, collapsing buildings and causing widespread panic.
snippet: Video reports poured out of Turkey on Sunday after a powerful earthquake struck the country's eastern region, collapsing buildings and causing widespread panic.
lead_paragraph: Updated | Monday | 9:29 a.m. After a powerful earthquake struck eastern Turkey on Sunday, video posted online showed collapsed buildings and widespread panic.

headline.main: Video From the Quake Zone in Turkey
